name: coup-map
description: A map showing all COUP scooters in Berlin.
author: Jannis R <mail@jannisr.de>

scripts.build: env NODE_ENV=production browserify -g [ babelify --presets env ] -g [ envify purge ] client/index.js | uglifyjs -mc > client/bundle.js
scripts.build:dev: env NODE_ENV=dev browserify -g envify client/index.js > client/bundle.js
